name: Risperidone Microspheres Long-Acting Injectable
summary: Risperidone microspheres LAI is a long-acting injectable formulation of risperidone designed for sustained antipsychotic effect, administered every two weeks.
description: Risperidone microspheres LAI is an extended-release formulation using biodegradable polymer microspheres to deliver risperidone over a two-week period. It is indicated for the treatment of schizophrenia and as maintenance therapy in bipolar I disorder. This formulation improves adherence by reducing dosing frequency and maintaining stable plasma drug concentrations. It works through antagonism of dopamine D2 and serotonin 5-HT2A receptors, helping to alleviate both positive and negative symptoms of psychosis and stabilize mood.

off_label_uses: Behavioral symptoms in dementia (not recommended in elderly with dementia-related psychosis)
contraindications: Hypersensitivity to risperidone or formulation components

items: Maintenance treatment of bipolar I disorder

sections.text: Antagonizes dopamine D2 and serotonin 5-HT2A receptors, reducing psychotic symptoms and stabilizing mood. Microsphere technology provides gradual drug release.
